definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: I won't forget you all my life, you will be in my mind forever.
sentences.chinese: 今生今世我都不会忘记你，你将是我永远的记忆。

sentences.english: Buddha said, glancing back for 500 years in the preexistence could get the meeting today.
sentences.chinese: 佛说，前世五百年的回眸，才换作今生的偶遇。

sentences.english: A glance five hundred years ago gain a shoulder this life .
sentences.chinese: 前生五百次的凝眸，换今生一次的擦肩。

sentences.english: Preexistence, moss are students themselves into a part of living trees.
sentences.chinese: 前世今生，苔藓们生生地把自己活成树木的一部分。

sentences.english: Buddha Said:" one encounter this life is at the cost of preexistence five hundreds turning eyes back."

sentences.english: And will sing as bait, fishing line may edge of life.

sentences.english: Our homes should be among the most hallowed of all earthly sanctuaries .

sentences.english: Your smile is my life can not forget her.

sentences.english: In other words, don't take the problems and troubles in this life tooseriously.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，不要把今生的困苦和患难看得过重。

sentences.english: The kindness of my uncle and aunt can never be requited.
sentences.chinese: 舅舅和舅母的恩典今生今世也报不了。

sentences.english: And when my work shall be done in this world, O King of kings.
sentences.chinese: 当我已完成了今生今世的工作，我的王中之王呵。

sentences.english: Is still this life me walk too hurried, forget to gather together float on the scattered oath in wind.

sentences.english: The conflict between these two realities cannot be resolved in this life.
sentences.chinese: 这两个相互冲突的事实恐怕无法在今生今世化解。

sentences.english: In the preexistence and this life of dreams, looking for remnants of memories of love.
sentences.chinese: 在前世今生的梦里，寻找残留着爱的回忆。

sentences.english: But scratches shoulder's flash in your me, was doomed this life to continue the reason.
sentences.chinese: 而就在你我擦肩的一瞬间，就注定了今生的续缘。
